mapper.select: select pg_id, waybill_id, pg_payment, pg_service_money, pg_actual_money, Outlets_Id1, Emp_id, Outlets_Id2, sender, sender_phone, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness from lms.fi_payment_goods where pg_id = #{pgId}

select pg_id, waybill_id, pg_payment, pg_service_money, pg_actual_money, Outlets_Id1, Emp_id, Outlets_Id2, sender, sender_phone, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness from lms.fi_payment_goods limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into lms.fi_payment_goods(waybill_id, pg_payment, pg_service_money, pg_actual_money, Outlets_Id1, Emp_id, Outlets_Id2, sender, sender_phone, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness) values (#{waybillId}, #{pgPayment}, #{pgServiceMoney}, #{pgActualMoney}, #{outletsId1}, #{empId}, #{outletsId2}, #{sender}, #{senderPhone}, #{addname}, #{addtime}, #{updatename}, #{updatetime}, #{deletename}, #{deletetime}, #{timeliness})

insert into lms.fi_payment_goods(waybill_id, pg_payment, pg_service_money, pg_actual_money, Outlets_Id1, Emp_id, Outlets_Id2, sender, sender_phone, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness) values
(#{entity.waybillId}, #{entity.pgPayment}, #{entity.pgServiceMoney}, #{entity.pgActualMoney}, #{entity.outletsId1}, #{entity.empId}, #{entity.outletsId2}, #{entity.sender}, #{entity.senderPhone}, #{entity.addname}, #{entity.addtime}, #{entity.updatename}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.deletename}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.timeliness})

insert into lms.fi_payment_goods(waybill_id, pg_payment, pg_service_money, pg_actual_money, Outlets_Id1, Emp_id, Outlets_Id2, sender, sender_phone, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness) values
(#{entity.waybillId}, #{entity.pgPayment}, #{entity.pgServiceMoney}, #{entity.pgActualMoney}, #{entity.outletsId1}, #{entity.empId}, #{entity.outletsId2}, #{entity.sender}, #{entity.senderPhone}, #{entity.addname}, #{entity.addtime}, #{entity.updatename}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.deletename}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.timeliness})
on duplicate key update waybill_id = values(waybill_id) , pg_payment = values(pg_payment) , pg_service_money = values(pg_service_money) , pg_actual_money = values(pg_actual_money) , Outlets_Id1 = values(Outlets_Id1) , Emp_id = values(Emp_id) , Outlets_Id2 = values(Outlets_Id2) , sender = values(sender) , sender_phone = values(sender_phone) , AddName = values(AddName) , ADDTIME = values(ADDTIME) , UpdateName = values(UpdateName) , UpdateTime = values(UpdateTime) , DeleteName = values(DeleteName) , DeleteTime = values(DeleteTime) , TimeLiness = values(TimeLiness)
mapper.update:
update lms.fi_payment_goods
waybill_id = #{waybillId},
pg_payment = #{pgPayment},
pg_service_money = #{pgServiceMoney},
pg_actual_money = #{pgActualMoney},
Outlets_Id1 = #{outletsId1},
Emp_id = #{empId},
Outlets_Id2 = #{outletsId2},
sender = #{sender},
sender_phone = #{senderPhone},
AddName = #{addname},
ADDTIME = #{addtime},
UpdateName = #{updatename},
UpdateTime = #{updatetime},
DeleteName = #{deletename},
DeleteTime = #{deletetime},
TimeLiness = #{timeliness},
where pg_id = #{pgId}
